de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.optics

Class OPTICSClusterVisualization<D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.AbstractVisualization
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.optics.AbstractOPTICSVisualization<D>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.optics.OPTICSClusterVisualization<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distance type (actually unused)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultListener, Visualization, EventListener

    public class OPTICSClusterVisualization<D extends Distance<D>>
extends AbstractOPTICSVisualization<D>
    Visualize the clusters and cluster hierarchy found by OPTICS on the OPTICS Plot.
